body:
<!--StartFragment-->

Lefor Divine D. aka Daddy D is a dynamic Trainer, extraordinary results-oriented Teacher, an uncommon highly sought out Thought Leader and a Life Coach par excellence. 

> I wear several hats. I am G.O. of Wisdom Center, speaker, Author, Life coach, Trainer, Consultant, Relationship Expert, Recording Artist and Song Writer, the CEO of Wisdom Records and the Founder of Wisdom Foundation. I am equally Rapper/Singer. mostly in afro pop but very versatile and cover a wide range of genres.

Known for his uncommon wisdom, love for beauty and excellence, remarkable depths of knowledge and insights, he is without doubt a formidable trans-generational force to reckon with and a global transformational leader and trailblazer in this 21st century. 

He is amongst many things a recognized Author, Relationship Expert/Coach, Trainer, Leadership Expert, Corporate/Personal Consultant, Financial Empowerment Strategist, Recording Artist and Song Writer and above all a lover of God.

He is passionate about servant leadership, holistic prosperity, nation building and global influence through purpose driven schemes and personal development. 

He is the Founder and CEO of God's Business Agency, the Founder of Diwise Consulting, the G.O. of Wisdom Center International, the Founder and President of Wisdom Foundation, the CEO of Wisdom Records and a prolific Author of several classics under Wisdom Publishers. 



<!--EndFragment-->
summary: I am G.O. of Wisdom Center, speaker, Author, Life coach, Trainer, Consultant, Relationship Expert, Recording Artist and Song Writer, the CEO of Wisdom Records and the Founder of Wisdom Foundation. I am equally Rapper/Singer. mostly in afro pop but very versatile and cover a wide range of genres.
